articles.title: What We (Don't) Talk About When We Talk About AI in Education: A Posthumanist Response to Audrey Watters

J. Owen Matson, 
Intralation: Culture, Theory, Pedagogy, 
Jun 01, 2025


 
 
Owen Matson offers this cogent critique of Audrey Watters, not from the perspective of a defense of AI, but by presenting Watters as a defender of a traditional humanist perspective…

articles.title: Study Reveals What Grip Strength Means About Your Health
articles.description: New research suggests that grip strength is a good indicator of longevity. Experts explain how grip strength may indicate how long you’ll live.

articles.title: Experimenting with generative AI to kibbitz and futz towards more inclusive futures
